mapper.select: SELECT PR.NO , TO_CHAR(PR.RSV_BEGIN, 'HH24:MI') RSV_BEGIN , TO_CHAR(PR.RSV_END, 'HH24:MI') RSV_END , PP.NAME NAME FROM PLACE_RESERVATION PR JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PR.EMP_NO = E.NO JOIN PUBLIC_PLACE PP ON PR.PL_NO = PP.NO WHERE PR.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PLACE_RESERVATION WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND NO = #{no}
